https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rY7XzmfQgwMYJXAZSIChU5FLP7y.jpg A year after the events of the first season, a virus Digimon called Diaboromon appears and starts attacking the Internet. The children and their Digimon unite once more in order to prevent him from destroying every communications network on the planet. Digimon Adventure: Our War Game
